StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetPayGrades]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
select pay_grade_code as PayGradeCode, rank_code as RankCode, rank_long_desc as RankLongDescrip.on, short_desc as RankShortDescrip.on, type as Type from mcriss.dbo.pay_grade where pay_grade_code != ' ' and rank_code != ' '
FOR XML PATH('PayGrade'), ROOT('PayGrades')
